brief_title: Trastuzumab Combined With Pyrrolidine and Chemotherapy for Locally HER2 Positive Breast Cancer
drugs_list: Trastuzumab combined with Pyrotinib and chemotherapy
brief_summary: This study is a one-arm, open, phase II clinical study, and the study subjects are locally advanced and inflammatoryPatients with sexual or early HER2-positive breast cancer entered the trial period after signing informed consentTo evaluate trastuzumab combined with pyrrolitinib and chemotherapy regimen (TCbH+Py) for HER2 positive breastPathologic complete response rate (pCR) for adenocarcinoma.
